name: Digicert Mpki AnyCA REST Gateway Plugin
description: Digicert Mpki plugin for the AnyCA REST Gateway framework

ca_plugin_config.name: DigiCertSymUrl
ca_plugin_config.description: Base Url for Digicert mPKI REST API such as https://someurl/mpki/api/v1

ca_plugin_config.name: ClientCertLocation
ca_plugin_config.description: Location on the Gateway Server File System of Client Certificate sample: C:\temp\myclientcert.pfx

ca_plugin_config.name: ClientCertPassword
ca_plugin_config.description: Password for the SOAP Client Certificate.

ca_plugin_config.name: EndpointAddress
ca_plugin_config.description: Endpoint address for SOAP Service sample: https://someurl/pki-ws/certificateManagementService.

ca_plugin_config.name: OuStartPoint
ca_plugin_config.description: Value of the OuStartPoint Name that digicert expects in the API.
